Articles.Content: Has anyone or is anyone working on classic rocket plane replicas? Like the X-1 - X-15 planes? I mean these are key parts of the development of the space program. Im talking a FASAesquie pack with really good replicas of classic rocket planes that started the American Space program on its path to the moon. I am not a modder or a coder. I am strictly a consumer but would anyone be willing to take up this task? Im not talking about stock replicas. I am talking about high fidelity replicas of the X-1, X-2, X-15 and even a B-29 that could drop the vehicles just like in real life. I feel that would be a really awesome pack of models and it would probably be very popular. With FASA, all the soviet and American Probes, Soviet Stations, American Stations, being available, I think if someone wanted to play out an historical type of sandbox mode having the rocket planes would be a cool addition.
I echo the desire for a quality X-15 replica and reasons. Can do it in stock, but would dig the real thing.

I echo the desire for a quality X-15 replica and reasons. Can do it in stock, but would dig the real thing.

I know atleast the x-15 I mean that was a rocket plane and I don't think there is anything anymore kerbalesqe than the x-15. Lets take a person put him in what is basically a missile, and see what happens.
I mean an X-1 replica would be really nice!

I guess there isn't a demand for classic and historical planes/rocket plane replicas. You would think with the new update a classic plane pack combined with FASA would someone could have a good time reenacting an actual historical CAREER mode. Not just sandbox.

Edited December 19, 2014 by sp1989
